Steps.dailouge: Sonora/Castan thank you for coming so quickly.
It is an honor to serve you, Queen Viola. How may I be of assistance?
Something is happening in Harmony. There are vague reports of trouble from every kingdom.
I’ve reached out to the rulers of each kingdom but have received no response.
It may be that Composia is next. However, a tip from an interesting source said you might be able to help.
If the information I received is true, you are Harmony’s only hope. For now I am sending you to Accordia.
I want you to see what you can learn. From there you will continue on to Santur and then to Song.
Me?! I’ve only been a squire for a few months!
This mission doesn’t require you to be a squire per se. Only that you be yourself.
I know you are fairly new. However…you do have all the skills required to complete this quest.
You will need this.
This book has been guarded by Composian royals for centuries.
It will aid you by recording important knowledge you encounter on the way.
Thank you, your highness. I don’t know what else to say.
I know it’s not much but that’s all the information I can give you.
Now, (pauses) deep within the dungeons, there is a prisoner who may be able to offer you vital information.
He was caught attempting to steal from the royal treasury.
He was caught attempting to steal from the royal treasury.
He is a cunning and dreaded thief known across all of Harmony
Deliver a meal to his cell, question him  then make haste to Accordia.
Yes, your highness.
Should you succeed in your quest, all of Harmony will know your name. Good luck young squire.
